short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new way to see the news that matters to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NowOn is a great way to get the news you want, directly in every new tab.

Imagine: instead of opening new tabs to get to your news content, it's brought directly to you in a clean and efficient way.

Select the sites you want to use and watch the magic unfold every time you open your browser- that's why we're doing this from NowOn.
